meanings.definition: The process of removing caffeine from coffee beans.
meanings.sent1: The decaffeinations of the coffee beans ensure a milder flavor for those who prefer less caffeine.
meanings.sent2: I learned about decaffeinations when I switched to drinking coffee without caffeine.
meanings.sent3: The decaffeinations of the coffee beans turned out to be quite a challenge for the new barista.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to decaffeinations was like carefully unraveling a tangled thread.
meanings.sent5: The decaffeinations process was like a delicate dance to preserve the rich aroma of the coffee beans.

meanings.definition: The act of making coffee without caffeine.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the decaffeinations of her morning brew for a more relaxed start to the day.
meanings.sent2: The café offered decaffeinations as an option for customers looking to reduce their caffeine intake.
meanings.sent3: The decaffeinations of the coffee resulted in a surprisingly flavorful cup.
meanings.sent4: Choosing decaffeinations felt like stepping into a quieter, calmer morning routine.
meanings.sent5: The decaffeinations of the coffee brought a soothing warmth without the jolt of caffeine.

meanings.definition: The removal of caffeine from a substance.
meanings.sent1: The decaffeinations of the tea leaves left a pure, caffeine-free infusion.
meanings.sent2: I appreciated the decaffeinations process for allowing me to enjoy my favorite drinks without caffeine.
meanings.sent3: The decaffeinations of the energy drink seemed like a magic trick to some.
meanings.sent4: The decaffeinations of the soda felt like taking out the spark from a firework.
meanings.sent5: The decaffeinations of the chocolate bar made it a guilt-free treat for many.
